1.  (**2.7**) 2, 4, 8, 10

1.  For each of the following, find the equilibria, determine their stability and produce a bifurcation diagram. Include appropriate sentences summarizing the various cases.

    a.  $x' = h - x^3$
    
    a.  $x' = hx - x^2$
    
    a.  $x' = (1-x)(x^2-h)$
    
    a.  $x' = (x-\sqrt{h})(3-hx)$
    
    a.  $x' = -(1+x)(x^2-h^2)$
    
    a.  $x' = (x-1)(x-h)$
    
    a.  $x'= x(1 - x) ^ 2 + \alpha$
